chargeHist.descr: 1st Degree Child Sex Assault - Sexual Contact with Person under Age of 13

result.execSummary:
The defendant Scott A. Brenner was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Incest with Child by Stepparent, a class C felony, Wisconsin Statutes 948.06(1m).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes:
**Conditions of Extended Supervision to be the same as Conditions of Probation**

If Probation or Extended Supervision is revoked or discharged with outstanding financial obligations, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant in favor of restitution victims and/or governmental entities for the balance due.  All available enforcement actions will be used to collect the debt.

If Probation or Extended Supervision is revoked or discharged with outstanding financial obligations, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant in favor of restitution victims and/or governmental entities for the balance due.  All available enforcement actions will be used to collect the debt.

miscConds.notes: PAYABLE DIRECTLY TO AND COLLECTED BY EAU CLAIRE COUNTY CLERK OF COURT.  NOT A CONDITION OF PROBATION.

No contact with H.L. or B.L. without consent of their mother, father and the agent.
No contact with anyone under 18 without other adults present (with the exception of his daughter L.B.) Contact with L.B. to be determined by Family Court.
Defendant not to consume/possess any alcohol or go into any taverns, bars, establishment/place where alcohol primarily is served/sold.
No use or possession of pornography in any form.
No use or possession of firearms or ammunition.

Any conditions/programming/counseling per agent.
Provide DNA sample and pay surcharge.
Sex Offender Assessment and Treatment/Programming.
Register as Sex Offender for 20 years of Probation and for 15 years thereafter.

timeConds.notes: Huber has been granted. Jail stayed to Sunday 12-13-15 at 9:00 am.
